row.process:
:INC QA.INCLUDE.X.UC4.ADMIN.SQL_INFO ! ! This sets information specific to each UC4 system, based on ! environment, in relation to "updating" the databases. !
:SET &UPDATEUSER# = GET_VAR(SYSTEM.VARIABLE.X.UC4.X.ENV,UC4_LIVEDB_UPDATE_LOGIN) :SET &DBSERVICENAME# = GET_VAR(SYSTEM.VARIABLE.X.UC4.X.ENV,UC4_LIVEDB_SERVICE_NAME) :SET &DBSCHEMANAME# = GET_VAR(SYSTEM.VARIABLE.X.UC4.X.ENV,UC4_LIVEDB_SCHEMA_NAME)
:PUT_ATT LOGIN = '&UPDATEUSER#' :PRINT 'Job will use login &UPDATEUSER#.'
:PUT_ATT DATABASE_NAME = '&DBSERVICENAME#' :PRINT 'Job will use service name &DBSERVICENAME#.'
:PRINT 'Job will use schema name &DBSCHEMANAME#.'
